So what do\\add this mod......

Than i\'m start this mod i jsut wont create more detailed textures for darkbrotherhood armor(i\'m realy dont like original armor).But then i\'m start work on this i decide that this must be not just retexture,this armor must be a full separate mod....

So here you are new armor with hight detailed textures
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Location:

Dawnstar Sanctuary(chest near Mother of Night\\NightMother)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Armor Raiting:

Armor(female\\male):

Weight - 6
Armor Raiting - 28

Boots(female\\male)

Weight - 2
Armor Raiting - 9

Gloves(female\\male)

Weight - 2
Armor Raiting - 9

Hood(female\\male)(not suppor beast race - in progress)

Weight - 2
Armor Raiting - 14

Mask(female\\male)(not suppor beast race - in progress)

Weight - 2
Armor Raiting - 7
------------------------------------------------------------------
Also want said my BIG THANKS to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/759307]VictoriaG[/url] for her awesome screenshots
-------------------------------------------------------------------
P.S. You can not upload this mod to another site\\rework textures\\models without my permission.Also i\'m  already find some my works in steam workshop and on another sites and all of they upload without my permission
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enjoy
author: NewerMind43
